name: Last Cell Standing
description:
Senpai Studios

Last Cell Standing

Experimental Game Jam 1

Defend the human from COVID-19! Use your immune system cells to send waves of protection against waves of viruses. A strategy and the challenging game developed from the current global pandemic.

  • Narrative
    • COVID-19 infection of the body
    • Protection against death
    • Immune system learning
  • Challenge
    • Virus (COVID-19)
    • Timer (Challenging with your friends who is going to be the fastest)
  • Discovery
    • Learn about the immune system
    • Types of cells protect against certain types of viruses
